author: Budapest Association for International Sports
title: Beach Volleyball - BAIS , BME Sporttelep, Budapest, 14 January 2024
text:
Advertisement 🏐🌞 Covered Beach Volleyball 🌞🏐
The courts are Covered, so don't worry about the weather!
* Don't need registration, just please press GOING ( MAX. 18)*
🎒 Don't worry about equipment, but if you have a ball, please bring it!
🔸 Event Details 🔸
📍 Location: BME Sporttelep, Budapest, Hungary (Location Link: https://goo.gl/maps/ykmoRKpToefN62F76)
🗓 Date & Time: Sunday, 14:00 🕓
💰 Cost: 2000 - 3000 FT per person (Revolut, Wise or Cash)
BAIS is not collecting money, it's done by the organiser to cover the expenses.
👕 Please wear comfortable sportswear and remember to bring your own water bottle 💧 to keep hydrated!
All levels are welcome 🤗, so don't hesitate to join in the fun and learn something new! 🏖 Come make new friends , get fit , and, most importantly, enjoy the spirit of beach volleyball!
Our WhatsApp group:
https://chat.whatsapp.com/KbJXSt0aOLP6pJsldebaHs
✏️ Mark your calendar , invite your friends 📲, and see you on the sand!
🌴🏐 Let's gear up for a summer full of action-packed volleyball! 🌞🏐🏆
BAIS Team. Advertisement Event Venue & Nearby Stays BME Sporttelep, Bogdánfy utca 42, Budapest 1117, Magyarország,Budapest, Hungary
